description:
What is this course about?

This course is about learning more about what are binary options signals and binary options auto traders (robots). Once you understand more what a signal is I review the various binary signals services including the pros and cons.

What do I need for this course?

You don't require anything however I highly recommend having a beginner understanding of binary options, forex or CFD trading. I have published other course which I recommend to complete before moving onto this course.

If you are already trading binary options and after more signals then you can start this course straight away, I'm confident you will find invaluable information here.

How is the course structured?

The course starts with an introductory lesson which I suggest you watch first especially if you have no knowledge of what is a binary options signal. If you are familiar or have used a signal service then I jump right in to the various service reviews.

Why take this course?

As I mentioned before, you should take this course to start you understanding of what is a binary options signal and why traders use them.
title: Binary Options Signals Course
